item.title: Daily dog poo, 26th December

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clifden Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Dangerous cycling on Riverside walk, 26th December
item.description:
A lot of bicycle riders are not respecting the no bikes signs on the Riverside walk. As a result several times I have witnessed a dangerous riding that almost hit children. I'd have noticed that the Riverside walk is not added to the restricted zones in apps for bicycle share like Lime, Santander, etc. Because of that I'd like to update the Lambeth restricted zones to include this area as a no go zone.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathwall Quay, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old dirty mattress outside 57 Bethel Road, 26th December
item.description:
Dirty mattress on pavement blocking route for pedestrians There was a skip previously with rubbish and the mattress was on there but the skip is now gone and the mattress remains, so I believe it was fly tipped and probably didn’t belong to the person who paid for the skip The mattress has been there for nearly a week now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bethel Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foul water leakage, 26th December
item.description:
There is constantly water running across the pedestrian footpath by the garage. The smell it offensively bad, possibly foul water from a damaged drain. This has been going on for some months now. Please attend and investigate. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing rubbish left behind on Merriam Ave Carpark, 26th December
item.description:
Bins were cleared however the overflowing rubbish has been left behind. Due to missed collections, the bins servicing surrounding flats were overflowing. The bins were cleared this morning, however the area was left in a filthy, unhygienic condition.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eastway, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lack of cleaning and ASB as homeless persons stuff, 26th December
item.description:
This area has been left in this condition for some time and has not been properly cleaned. As a result, residents have had to clean parts of the estate themselves. However, the downstairs area near the stairs remains in a very poor condition and looks neglected. This is unacceptable and highlights the ongoing failure to carry out proper estate cleaning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Union Street, Southwark, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In Beckenham Rd, Beckenham at the jct with Barnmead Rd, the 'No right turn' sign and lamp are rotated 45° away from oncoming traffic., 26th December
item.description:
In Beckenham Rd, Beckenham at the jct with Barnmead Rd, the 'No right turn' sign and lamp are rotated 45° away from oncoming traffic. The banned right turn relates to 'No entry' into Mackenzie Rd which is a one way road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 253, Beckenham Road, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Dog pee and poo in comunal areas at Linford house, 26th December
item.description:
There is only one dog in the building and lives on flat 7 Linford house. For many years now his career allows him to foul in the comunal areS including stairs, landing and lift. ongoing for at least 4 years. I WANT TO REMAIN ANONYMOUS DUE TO THREATS

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wrong marking, 26th December
item.description:
It’s a wrong road marking there. It should be 2 straight and 1 left turn lane on a roundabout or 1 straight,middle straight and left and third lane to left
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Manorway, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
